# A program to demonstrate the use of augmented assignments.

# Augmented assignments are used to assign the result of func1





def func1(a):

    a += 3

# A program to demonstrate the use of augmented assignments.

# Augmented assignments are used to assign the result of func1





def func1(a):

    a += 3

    a *= 2

# A program to demonstrate the use of augmented assignments.

# Augmented assignments are used to assign the result of func1





def func1(a):

    a += 3

    a *= 2

    return a





b = func1(5)
